import React, {useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; export default function EditBook() { const [loadedPlace, setLoadedPlace] = useState(); const bookId = useParams().bookId; const handleChange = (event) => { event.persist(); setValues(values => ({ ...values, [event.target.name]: event.target.value })); } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const book = { title: values.title, author: values.author, imageUrl: values.imageUrl, year: values.year, pages: values.pages, description: values.description } setValues(book); axios.patch (`http://localhost:8000/api/admin/books/edit/` + bookId) .then(res => { console.log(res.data); history.push('/admin/edit/' + bookId); }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }; return(

Edit

 ) }
